name: Streetball The Mecca
description:
Create your own Legend

Conquer the mecca of basketball in this new 2D basketball game! Pull out the flashiest moves and style on your opponents in one on one games. Play throughout the city, on new and famous courts and cement your legacy as a legend of the streets. This new blend of a 2D fighter and a basketball game will give you multiple unique characters each with their own play style.

- Local Multiplayer: Up to 4 players can play one on one, (on one on one) basketball to determine the king of the court
- Tutorial: Learn not only the basics but also the intricacies of each character
- Shoot Around: Just chill and practice combos on a court where you control everything
- Shop: Purchase new outfits with money earned exclusively in game.

While you can play this game on a Keyboard local multiplayer requires at least one player to use a controller
